summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6387, for the improvement of the ALLEY in Block 2, BRYGGER'S SECOND HOME ADDITION to the City of Ballard, being the alley between Northwest 59th Street and Northwest 60th Street from 36th Avenue Northwest to 34th Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 97907, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
